summary: This is an email from September 2021 where an unidentified sender provides a tip about a potential witness or associate, referencing a blonde woman from around 2002 and mentioning a person named Peter Gi. The sender suggests this could be a promising lead and cautions about contacting Peter Gi.

persons.name: Peter Gi
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who may have information; the sender provides his phone number and warns that contacting him might reveal the sender's involvement.

connections.description: The sender has previously texted Peter Gi about the matter and is concerned Peter Gi will link any contact back to the sender.
Implied connection as Peter Gi may have information about the blonde woman who was at the sender's house around 2002.

events.title: Blonde woman at sender's house
events.description: An unidentified blonde woman was at the sender's house around 2002, referenced as part of a potential lead.

events.title: Email tip sent
events.description: An email is sent providing a tip about a potential witness or associate, mentioning Peter Gi and a blonde woman from 2002.

keyFacts: The document is an email from September 2021 providing a tip about a potential lead related to the Epstein case.
It references an unidentified blonde woman who was at the sender's house around 2002.
It mentions a person named Peter Gi, whose phone number is provided, with a warning that contacting him might reveal the sender's involvement.
The sender suggests the lead might be promising because the woman talks when drunk.
